title: Embedded Systems (3 credits)
content: Introduction to microcontrollers, Memory organization of microcontrollers, Programming of flash microcontrollers, I/O port configuration and programming interfaces, A/D converters and applications, Timer systems of microcontrollers, Applications of non-volatile memory, Industrial Applications, Student Project.

title: CO324 Network and Web Application Design (3 credits)
CO325 Computer and Network Security (3 credits)
